lead_paragraph: The Devils finally have a legitimate goal scorer, and this one is coming to New Jersey with a chip on his shoulder after a surprising trade.

headline.print_headline: Devils Acquire Former No. 1 Pick Taylor Hall From Oilers
headline.main: Devils Acquire Former No. 1 Pick Taylor Hall From Oilers

snippet: The Devils finally have a legitimate goal scorer, and this one is coming to New Jersey with a chip on his shoulder after a surprising trade....
